to.sven.androidrccar.host.logic.impl

Class HostLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.common.logic.impl.AbstractLogic<IHostDependencyContainer,IHostLogicListener>
      • to.sven.androidrccar.host.logic.impl.HostLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRemoteCommunicationListener, ILogic, ILogicHandlerFacade<IHostDependencyContainer>, IAccessoryCommunicationListener, IHostLogicHandlerFacade

    public class HostLogic
extends AbstractLogic<IHostDependencyContainer,IHostLogicListener>
implements IHostLogicHandlerFacade, IAccessoryCommunicationListener
    Logic for the Host: It is the "missing" part between the AccessoryCommunication (, the other services: location and camera on the host) and the client. So it handles the communication between all parts of the host.
    Author:
    sven
